keyword: how many calories are in a roll of sushi
title: How Many Calories Are in a Roll of Sushi?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a roll of sushi, including macros like protein and carbs, plus variations and FAQs for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Roll of Sushi?
assumptions: Standard California roll (8 pieces, ~200g total), with sushi rice, imitation crab, avocado, cucumber; no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by roll type, ingredients, rice portion, and preparation; restaurant vs. homemade differs. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical California sushi roll contains about 255 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp spicy mayo per roll

faqs.q: How many calories are in a roll of sushi?
faqs.a: About 255 kcal for a standard California roll (8 pieces).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a sushi roll?
faqs.a: Typically 38 g carbs per roll, mostly from rice.
Yes, around 700 mg per roll due to soy sauce and seasonings.

faqs.q: How does roll type affect calories?
faqs.a: Veggie rolls are lower (~200 kcal); fried or creamy ones higher (300+ kcal).
About 9 g per standard roll, higher with fish or shrimp.
